segments.text: I cannot believe the woman is so utterly oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is diligently drying a plate, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The running water must be making quite a sound, yet she hears nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in a spreading puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can one be so disconnected from their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of the water pouring onto the cabinet doors is quite unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems almost absurd, this level of unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are practically performing a circus act behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She continues her routine, a picture of domestic tranquility gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene has a surreal, almost dreamlike quality to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just watching this unfold, unable to do anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to witness such a preventable mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is truly baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR
